message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its unique value, I'm asking for $22,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation of the product. I am willing to pay $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I can come down to $19,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $14,000.
